====================================================================================
ANOOB'S BRRES MATERIAL TOOL
Version: 1.3.0
Author: Robert Nelson
OS: linux
Github: https://github.com/Robert-N7/abmatt
====================================================================================

Thank you for downloading ABMatt!
The entry points for abmatt are under the 'bin' folder (abmatt, abmatt-gui).
Add to your system path for easier access.
